last_episode_to_air.name: Usagi’s Love! The Moonlight Illuminates the Galaxy
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moon's star seed, the Light of Hope finally reveals itself. Turning into a sword, the Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia, who is now fully consumed by Chaos.

name: Sailor Moon
original_name: 美少女戦士セーラームーン
overview: One day, Usagi Tsukino, clumsy 2nd-year middle school student, stumbles upon a talking cat named Luna. Luna tells her that she is destined to be Sailor Moon, "champion of love and justice", and she must search for the fabled Moon Princess. Usagi finds friends that turn out to be destined senshi as well, and together they fight to save the world from the certain doom brought upon by the Dark Kingdom.

seasons.name: Sailor Moon
seasons.overview: Usagi Tsukino is a cheerful 14-year-old schoolgirl who often finds herself in unwanted trouble. One day, she saves a talking cat named Luna from some mean kids, and her life is changed forever. Luna gives Usagi a magic brooch that transforms her into Sailor Moon, defender of love and justice! Now Usagi must work with Luna to find the other Sailor Guardians and the Moon Princess, whose Legendary Silver Crystal is Earth's only hope against the dark forces of the evil Queen Beryl!

seasons.name: Sailor Moon R
seasons.overview: Usagi and her friends return to their normal lives after their epic battle, but the Sailor Guardians are called back into action when powerful new enemies appear. By the power of the Legendary Silver Crystal, Sailor Moon gains strength with a dazzling new attack and transformation. The coming battle won't be easy, but things get even more complicated when a mysterious pink-haired girl falls from the sky and goes after Mamoru!

seasons.name: Sailor Moon S
seasons.overview: Isagi's friend Rei has been plagued by disturbing visions of the Apocalypse just as a new enemy appears in the city. The Maniacal Professor Tomoe, leader of the Death Busters, has been targeting innocent citizens in search for three special pure heart crystals. Usagi is prepared to confront this dangerous new foe, but two powerful new Sailor Guardians are already seeking the crystals and have no interest in working with Sailor Moon and the other Guardians. Where did they come from, and what is their plan for pure heart crystals?

seasons.name: Sailor Moon SuperS
seasons.overview: A majestic pegasus with a golden horn has appeared in Chibi-Usa's dreams with a request - to help him and keep his presence a secret. This plea turns out to be more than a childish dream, for soon the fearsome Dead Moon Circus arrives in town! Led by the villainous Zirconia and the beautiful Queen Nehalennia, their goal is to draw out Pegasus by targeting people with beautiful dreams! Sailor Moon and the Sailor Guardians must unite to fight powerful new enemies, but these enemies are hiding secrets of their own...

seasons.name: Sailor Moon Sailor Stars
seasons.overview:
The five Sailor Guardians – Usagi, Ami, Rei, Makoto, and Minako enter high school, while Mamoru heads to America for college. Their new lives, filled with dreams and hopes, begin. However, this peace won't last long as a new, powerful, and evil enemy is approaching Earth: Sailor Galaxia, who has been gathering star seeds throughout the galaxy and scheming to rule the universe with limitless power.

Sensing that Sailor Moon is in danger, the four Guardians of the Outer Planets – Sailor Uranus, Sailor Neptune, Sailor Pluto, and Sailor Saturn- also make their entry, and the ten Sailor Guardians are together again! On top of this, a group of mysterious Sailor Guardians known as the Sailor Star Lights also appear.

tagline: In the name of the Moon, I'll punish you!

episodes.name: The Crybaby: Usagi's Beautiful Transformation
episodes.overview: Usagi Tsukino is a 14-year-old schoolgirl who is very cheerful, but clumsy and is always finding herself into unwanted trouble. One day, Usagi meets a talking black cat named Luna, who reveals that dark forces are threatening the lives of the innocent and that Usagi has the power to stop them. Using a magical brooch, Usagi is transformed into Sailor Moon, the chosen guardian who fights for love and justice.

episodes.name: Punishment Awaits: The House Of Fortune Is The Monster Mansion
episodes.overview: The boys at Usagi's school are misbehaving, and it may have something to do with the mysterious new fortune teller in town.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Sleeping Sickness: Protect the Girls in Love
episodes.overview: All the girls in town are tuning in to the late-night radio program called "Midnight Zero" that reads out love letters sent in by the listeners. Meanwhile, a strange sleeping sickness is plaguing the town, causing people to fall into a coma-like state, including Ms. Haruna and Naru.

episodes.name: Learn How to Be Skinny from Usagi
episodes.overview: Usagi is shocked to find out that she's gained weight from too much eating. Determined to get back into shape and fast, she and her friends join a gym that advertises instant results for its members.

episodes.name: Scent of a Monster: Chanela Will Steal Your Love
episodes.overview: Usagi tries to convince her parents to let her adopt Luna, but her brother Shingo has a great disliking of Luna and slight ailurophobia. Later, a mysterious new pet store opens in town which is selling strange new creatures that put Shingo and everyone else who gets one into a hypnotic trance.

episodes.name: Protect the Melody of Love: Usagi Plays Cupid
episodes.overview: Usagi befriends Yusuke Amade, a jazz musician who is being followed by a Youma, and helps him confess to the woman he loves.

episodes.name: Usagi Learns Her Lesson: Becoming a Star Is Hard Work
episodes.overview: Usagi and Naru both dream of becoming stars like Mikan Shiritori, a graduate from their school. When the girls hear that Mikan is holding a talent contest, they see their chance to achieve stardom.

episodes.name: The Girl Genius Is a Monster: The Brainwashing Cram School of Horror
episodes.overview: The Sailor Guardians go to the Dream Land amusement park, where visitors have reportedly gone missing. The team splits into two groups: Usagi and Rei and Ami and Luna. But, much to Rei's frustration, Usagi is more focused on playing than finding the missing people.

episodes.name: Usagi's Disaster: Beware of the Clock of Confusion
episodes.overview: Usagi and Ami go to the city to enjoy some shopping, where they find a clock store selling a clock that resembles Luna. Later that day, Usagi is happy to learn that her mother bought the exact same clock as a gift. But that night, the clocks from the store emit a strange light, making Usagi and the rest of Tokyo very impatient.

episodes.name: The Cursed Bus: Enter Mars, the Guardian of Fire
episodes.overview: Several people who take the bus near the Hikawa Shrine have gone missing. Usagi, Ami, and Luna decide to investigate by visiting the shrine. There, they meet Rei Hino, a shrine maiden with strong spiritual powers.

episodes.name: Usagi vs. Rei: Nightmare in Dream Land
episodes.overview: Queen Beryl is increasingly furious with Jadeite for his repeated failures; he starts up a theme park, but the general public notices the large number of disappearances. Usagi and Rei, who is now Sailor Mars, begin their combative friendship.

episodes.name: I Want a Boyfriend: The Luxury Cruise Ship Is a Trap
episodes.overview: One of Queen Beryl's youma offers to help Jadeite with his wicked plans. Rei wins tickets on a luxury cruise ship and, since she has no boyfriend, asks Ami to accompany her. A jealous Usagi sneaks aboard after them.

episodes.name: Girls Unite: The End of Jadeite
episodes.overview: Usagi continues to be attracted to both Motoki and Tuxedo Mask. Threatened with Eternal Sleep if should he fail again, Jadeite confronts the Sailor Guardians at an airport.

episodes.name: A New Enemy Appears: Nephrite's Evil Crest
episodes.overview: Nephrite is appointed as Jadeite's successor and begins selecting individual targets for energy, the first one being Naru's friend Rui.

episodes.name: Usagi's Panic: Rei's First Date
episodes.overview: Rei falls for Mamoru and persuades him to go on a date with her, whilst Nephrite targets the caretaker of a local park.

episodes.name: A Girl's Dream: Usagi Becomes a Bride
episodes.overview: Usagi decides to enter a homemade wedding dress contest, while her home economics teacher is targeted by Nephrite.

episodes.name: Usagi's a Model: The Flash of the Monster Camera
episodes.overview: Nephrite targets a gifted young photographer, while Usagi tries to achieve her dream of becoming a model.

episodes.name: Shingo's Love: The Grieving Doll
episodes.overview: Shingo upsets his friend Mika, an award-winning doll maker whose skills make her the next target for Nephrite's energy gathering.

episodes.name: Usagi's Joy: A Love Letter from Tuxedo Mask
episodes.overview: Nephrite takes advantage of Sailor Moon's attraction to Tuxedo Mask by sending love letters to Usagi and her classmates. Naru falls in love with him in his civilian disguise, allowing him to drain a large amount of her energy.

episodes.name: The Summer, the Beach, Youth and Ghosts
episodes.overview: Usagi, Ami, Rei, and Luna take a vacation in order to train, but the hotel they have booked is haunted by a strange phenomenon.

episodes.name: Protect the Children's Dreams: Friendship Through Anime
episodes.overview: Nephrite uses his most powerful Youma to target an animator working for the new Sailor V movie.

episodes.name: Romance Under the Moon: Usagi's First Kiss
episodes.overview: Both Luna and Queen Beryl wonder if a visiting princess could be the one the Sailor Senshi has been looking for. Mamoru dreams he is Tuxedo Mask and a girl is asking him for the Silver Crystal. At the ball, Usagi gets her first kiss.

episodes.name: Wish upon a Star: Naru's First Love
episodes.overview: Zoisite decides to use Nephrite's recently discovered romantic feelings for Naru to manipulate him into handing over the Black Crystal to him.

episodes.name: Naru's Tears: Nephrite Dies for Love
episodes.overview: Still in love with Nephrite, Naru becomes an unwilling tool in the power struggle between Nephrite and Zoisite.

episodes.name: Jupiter, The Powerful Girl in Love
episodes.overview: Queen Beryl partially awakens the evil entity Metalia and sends Zoisite and Kunzite to find the Seven Great Youma and their Rainbow Crystals. Meanwhile, the tomboyish Makoto Kino transfers into Usagi's school and falls for a crane-game whiz at the arcade.

episodes.name: Restore Naru's Smile: Usagi's Friendship
episodes.overview: Naru is still very depressed after Nephrite's death. Usagi and Umino decide to take her to Yokohama to cheer her up. There, a kindly priest is attacked by Zoisite. Mamoru realizes that he is Tuxedo Mask, and drops a locket on the ground, where Usagi finds it.

episodes.name: Crushing On Ami: The Boy Who Can See the Future
episodes.overview: Ami meets Ryo Urawa, a clairvoyant boy who has a crush on her. However, Urawa's power makes him aware that he will soon be transformed into a Youma by Zoisite.

episodes.name: The Painting of Love: Usagi and Mamoru Get Closer
episodes.overview: Usagi and Mamoru are asked to model for the reclusive painter Yumemi Yumeno, who is unexpectedly targeted by Zoisite.

episodes.name: Total Chaos: The Messy Love Rectangle
episodes.overview: Makoto, like Usagi, develops a crush on Motoki. The two then decide to pursue him simultaneously, even after finding out that he has a girlfriend, who, meanwhile, is targeted by Zoisite and Kunzite.

episodes.name: Grandpa Loses Control: Rei in Danger
episodes.overview: After fighting off an attack by Zoisite, Rei's grandfather takes on an apprentice and begins acting strangely.

episodes.name: Love and Chased: Luna's Worst Day Ever
episodes.overview: Luna discovers that she has an admirer, in the form of an overweight tomcat named Rhett Butler. Meanwhile, the Sailor Guardians and Zoisite compete for the last Rainbow Crystal.

episodes.name: Umino's Resolve: I'll Protect Naru
episodes.overview: Umino misinterprets Usagi's advice on seducing Naru, and begins to adopt the persona of Tuxedo Mask.

episodes.name: Enter Venus, The Last Sailor Guardian
episodes.overview: Zoisite disguises himself as Sailor Moon to lure Tuxedo Mask and the Sailor Guardians out into the open. The Dark Kingdom injures Tuxedo Mask's identity, but they are foiled by the appearance of Sailor Venus.

episodes.name: The Shining Silver Crystal: The Moon Princess Appears
episodes.overview: Mamoru is forced to confront Zoisite in a duel over the Rainbow Crystals, but Usagi inadvertently becomes involved.

episodes.name: Returning Memories: Usagi and Mamoru's Past
episodes.overview: Usagi and Mamoru remember their former lives as Princess Serenity and Prince Endymion. The Dark Kingdom kidnaps the injured Mamoru, but Queen Beryl executes Zoisite for his attempt to kill him. Luna and Artemis tell the Sailor Guardians about their tragic past.

episodes.name: Usagi's Confusion: Is Tuxedo Mask Evil?
episodes.overview: Minako tries to cheer Usagi up by taking her to a hair salon, leading to the discovery that Tuxedo Mask is still alive, but now very different.

episodes.name: Let's Become a Princess: Usagi's Bizarre Training
episodes.overview: Determined to become more like the princess she is supposed to be, Usagi decides to enlist in Countess Rose's Princess Seminar.

episodes.name: The Snow, the Mountains, Friendship and Monsters
episodes.overview: Usagi and her friends visit the Moonlight Course skiing resort, unaware that Kunzite has sabotaged the Moon Princess Contest in order to unmask Sailor Moon.

episodes.name: Paired With a Monster: Mako, the Ice Skating Queen
episodes.overview: After discovering that the Moon Princess was once known for her graceful ice skating, Kunzite tries to use this information to trap Sailor Moon. The best skater among the girls, however, turns out to be Makoto. Tuxedo Mask appears to help them, but only because he does not agree with Kunzite's method of involving bystanders.

episodes.name: The Legendary Lake Yokai: The Bond of Usagi's Family
episodes.overview: Usagi and her family visit a hot springs resort, while Endymion is sent to resurrect an ancient legendary monster.

episodes.name: I Won't Run Away from Love Anymore: Ami vs. Mamoru
episodes.overview: Queen Beryl orders the seven people gathered who had carried Rainbow Crystals, intending to combine them into one huge youma. Ami is determined to protect Urawa. Sailor Moon tries to heal Endymion.

episodes.name: Sailor Venus' Past: Minako's Tragic Love
episodes.overview: Kunzite probes Sailor V's connection with the Sailor Senshi by targeting Katarina, an old acquaintance of Minako's.

episodes.name: Usagi Abandoned: The Falling-Out of the Sailor Guardians
episodes.overview: On orders from Queen Beryl, Kunzite and his Youma investigate the rumors of a rift between Sailor Moon and the other Inner Sailor Guardians, who seem to want both the mystical Moon Stick and the Silver Crystal for themselves.

episodes.name: Usagi's Awakening: A Message from the Distant Past
episodes.overview: A blast of energy sends the Guardians to the ruined Moon Kingdom, where they meet a hologram of Queen Serenity and learn about their past. Luna and Artemis find the entrance to the Dark Kingdom. Kunzite attacks, but is finally defeated by Sailor Moon.

episodes.name: Death of the Sailor Guardians: The Tragic Final Battle
episodes.overview: After defeating Kunzite, regaining their past memories, and discovering the Dark Kingdom's hideout the Sailor Senshi head for the enemy, but they must prepare for the ultimate sacrifice.

episodes.name: Usagi's Eternal Wish: A Brand New Life
episodes.overview: With her friends killed, Sailor Moon is transported inside the Dark Kingdom to face Queen Beryl and the brainwashed Prince Endymion.

1.name: Sailor Moon
1.overview: Usagi Tsukino is a cheerful 14-year-old schoolgirl who often finds herself in unwanted trouble. One day, she saves a talking cat named Luna from some mean kids, and her life is changed forever. Luna gives Usagi a magic brooch that transforms her into Sailor Moon, defender of love and justice! Now Usagi must work with Luna to find the other Sailor Guardians and the Moon Princess, whose Legendary Silver Crystal is Earth's only hope against the dark forces of the evil Queen Beryl!

episodes.name: Moon Returns: The Mysterious Aliens Appear
episodes.overview: Two mysterious aliens show up in town and Luna and Artemis restore Usagi's memories of being Sailor Moon

episodes.name: For Love and for Justice: Sailor Guardians Once Again
episodes.overview: Ali and En target a TV company who have invited Ami, Rei, Makoto, Minako and Naru for auditions. Luna and Artemis are forced to consider restoring the memories of the rest of the Sailor Team.

episodes.name: For Whom Is the White Rose? The Moonlight Knight Appears
episodes.overview: Makoto is forced to donate blood after her childhood friend is injured by a Cardian. Meanwhile, the mysterious Moonlight Knight appears in the midst of battle to help the Sailor Team.

episodes.name: Usagi's Crisis: The Tiara Stops Working
episodes.overview: Usagi visits the new Virtual Reality Theatre with Mamoru unaware that it is the next target for Ali and En's energy harvesting operations.

episodes.name: A New Transformation: Usagi's Power-Up
episodes.overview: A powerful Cardian attacks a cherry blossom viewing party, and Sailor Moon is suddenly unable to fight it.

episodes.name: The Targeted Kindergarteners: Venus to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Minako becomes entangled with a kindergarten student who worships Sailor Moon, just as the aliens chose to target younger victims for their energy.

episodes.name: Mamoru and Usagi's Babysitting Mayhem
episodes.overview: Ali and En are now targeting babies as a source of energy. When a baby's mother is attacked and in the hospital Mamoru and Usagi have to look after the child.

episodes.name: The School Festival Is for Me?! Queen Rei's Song
episodes.overview: Rei takes up songwriting for a school event. Ail and An target the event for its abundance of energy but end up getting parts in the play themselves.

episodes.name: Is Seijuro the Moonlight Knight? Mako on Fire
episodes.overview: Makoto develops a crush on Seijuro while Ami investigates the possibility that he is the Moonlight Knight.

episodes.name: Steal a Kiss from Mamoru: An's Project Snow White
episodes.overview: Some of Mamoru's college friends put on a production of Snow White and Usagi and her friends are only ones left to be in it. An assures she will be Snow White since Mamoru will be the prince, Ail becomes jealous and sends in a Cardian to attack.

episodes.name: After-School Trouble: Usagi Is a Target
episodes.overview: After Usagi is caught eating in class and An talks about to a teacher the two find themselves in detention and to survive An decides to steal her energy. Meanwhile, Ail faces off with the other Sailor Senshi using another Cardian.

episodes.name: Disconnecting Love: The Raging Makai Tree
episodes.overview: When the Makai Tree seems it is close to dying, Ail and An begin to steal even more energy but are horrified when the tree does not respond to the energy. Usagi pays the siblings a visit and is attacked by the Makai Tree.

episodes.name: True Love Awakens: The Makai Tree's Secret
episodes.overview: The Sailor Guardians have to save Usagi and Mamoru from the Makai Tree and in the process, Ail and An find out Sailor Moon's true identity.

episodes.name: Angel or Devil? The Mysterious Girl from the Sky
episodes.overview: A strange child, claiming to be called Usagi Tsukino, appears from the sky and demands the Silver Crystal from Usagi.

episodes.name: Usagi Devastated: Mamoru Declares a Break-Up
episodes.overview: Mamoru begins to experience bizarre visions, which prompt him to break up with Usagi. Meanwhile, Berthier begins to spread Dark Power via a cosmetics store.

episodes.name: A Guardian's Friendship: Goodbye, Ami
episodes.overview: Ami considers leaving Japan and her life as a Sailor Guardian behind to study medicine abroad in Germany. Meanwhile, Berthier takes over Bob-Floy, an ice cream store, to spread Dark Power.

episodes.name: Women Must Be Strong and Beautiful: Rei's New Special Technique
episodes.overview: Rei's grandfather tries to get more girls into the shrine, but Koan targets it in its role as a Star Point.

episodes.name: In Search of the Silver Crystal: Chibi-Usa's Secret
episodes.overview: In an attempt to 'smoke' Chibi-Usa out, Petz's droid creates a thunderstorm in hopes it will cause her strong magical energy to the peak.

episodes.name: Dispute Over Love: Minako and Makoto's Conflict
episodes.overview: Makoto and Minako get into a fight and refuse to speak to each other, while Calaveras and Petz take over a Crystal Point, a fortune-telling and jewelry store, to spread dark power.

episodes.name: Usagi's Parental Love: The Curry Romance Triangle
episodes.overview: Usagi and Chibi-Usa decide to make curry together for a party at her school, but the Juban Supermarket becomes targeted by Calaveras and Petz.

episodes.name: The Beach, the Island and a Vacation: The Guardians' Break
episodes.overview: The Senshi go on vacation to a remote island, where Chibi-Usa makes a new friend.

episodes.name: Protect Chibi-Usa: Clash of the Ten Warriors
episodes.overview: Wiseman predicts that Chibi-Usa will appear, so Rubeus sends the Spectre Sisters to capture her, leading to a battle with the Sailor Team.

episodes.name: Awaken the Sleeping Beauty: Mamoru's Distress
episodes.overview: Sailor Moon is attacked by a Droid who locks her in a nightmare, and the only one who can wake her is Tuxedo Mask.

episodes.name: Battle of the Flames of Love! Mars vs. Koan
episodes.overview: Koan makes a final bid to kill Chibi-Usa, convinced she can win Rubeus' heart. However, she faces unexpected opposition from Sailor Mars, and is shocked to be rejected by Rubeus.

episodes.name: For Friendship! Ami vs. Berthier
episodes.overview: Ami enters an international chess tournament at the Chess Tower, and discovers that Berthier has targeted the building.

episodes.name: Rubeus the Heartless: The Tragic Sisters
episodes.overview: Spurred on by Wiseman, Rubeus sends Calaveras and Petz on a suicide mission to kill the Sailor Senshi and Chibi-Usa.

episodes.name: A UFO Appears: The Sailor Guardians Abducted
episodes.overview: After discovering that he is to be withdrawn, Rubeus resorts to desperate measures to kill Chibi-Usa, and succeeds in abducting the Sailor Team.

episodes.name: Defeat Rubeus: The Battle in Space
episodes.overview: With the rest of the Sailor Team captured by Rubeus, Sailor Moon plans a rescue, and is taken aboard the UFO for a final showdown.

episodes.name: The Mysterious New Guardian: Sailor Pluto Appears
episodes.overview: Chibi-Usa becomes ill suddenly, her mind invaded by the power of the Evil Black Crystal. Sailor Pluto, a Sailor Senshi from the future, appears to the Sailor Team to offer her help.

episodes.name: Magic of Darkness: Esmeraude’s Invasion
episodes.overview: Esmeraude begins her attack on twentieth century Tokyo, attempting to nurture a Dark Henge on a Negative Point inside a cake shop.

episodes.name: Shared Feelings: Usagi and Mamoru in Love Once Again
episodes.overview: While Esmeraude targets the latest craze, promise rings, Usagi has a dream that may explain why Mamoru has been acting coldly towards her.

episodes.name: Venus: Minako's Nurse Mayhem
episodes.overview: Esmeraude releases a virulent strain of influenza into Tokyo, and only Minako and Chibi-Usa seem unaffected.

episodes.name: Artemis' Adventure: The Monster Animal Kingdom
episodes.overview: After Luna wounds his pride one too many times, Artemis sets out on a mission to prove his worth, and stumbles upon Esmeraude's latest plot.

episodes.name: The Terrifying Illusion: Ami All Alone
episodes.overview: Esmeraude attacks a local cram school, altering the behavior of the students there. When Ami investigates, she is subjected to a series of hallucinations by Esmeraude's Droid.

episodes.name: The Dark Gate Is Completed: The Targeted Elementary School
episodes.overview: Esmeraude attacks two targets simultaneously, creating chaos in Chibi-Usa's school, and the Sailor Team face off against her two Droids.

episodes.name: Journey to the Future: Battle in the Space-Time Corridor
episodes.overview: The Sailor Team accompany Chibi-Usa into the Space-Time Corridor, where they are attacked by Esmeraude and her Droid.

episodes.name: The Shocking Future: Demande’s Dark Ambition
episodes.overview: The Sailor Team arrive in the thirtieth century with Chibi-Usa, where they are met by King Endymion, Mamoru's future self.

episodes.name: Wiseman's Evil Hand: Chibi-Usa Disappears
episodes.overview: Chibi-Usa falls under the control of Wiseman, while Esmeraude resolves to kill Sailor Moon and win Prince Dimande's heart by any means necessary.

episodes.name: The Dark Queen: Birth of Black Lady
episodes.overview: Chibi-Usa is kidnapped by Wiseman. Who brainwashes her into thinking her parents don't love her and transforms her into a villain called Black Lady.

episodes.name: Saphir Dies: Wiseman’s Trap
episodes.overview: Saphir discovers that Wiseman has been plotting against the Black Moon Clan, and races to warn his brother of the betrayal.

episodes.name: Believing in Love and the Future: Usagi's Determination
episodes.overview: The Sailor Senshi go inside the growing Evil Black Crystal fragment, where Sailor Moon finally confronts Prince Dimande.

episodes.name: The Final Battle Between Light and Dark: Pledge of Love to the Future
episodes.overview: Sailor Moon faces Black Lady, as Wiseman prepares to fire the power of the Evil Black Crystal through the Dark Gate and destroy the Earth.

episodes.name: Usagi and the Girls' Resolve: Prelude to a New Battle
episodes.overview: The Sailor Team present a preview of the forthcoming season, and debate the prospect of selecting a new leader.

2.name: Sailor Moon R
2.overview: Usagi and her friends return to their normal lives after their epic battle, but the Sailor Guardians are called back into action when powerful new enemies appear. By the power of the Legendary Silver Crystal, Sailor Moon gains strength with a dazzling new attack and transformation. The coming battle won't be easy, but things get even more complicated when a mysterious pink-haired girl falls from the sky and goes after Mamoru!

episodes.name: Premonition of the Apocalypse? The Mysterious New Guardians Appear
episodes.overview: After she experiences apocalyptic visions, Rei is attacked by an extremely powerful monster that Sailor Moon cannot fight.

episodes.name: The Rod of Love is Born! Usagi’s New Transformation
episodes.overview: A young girl is attacked by a Daimon, but Usagi is no longer able to transform into Sailor Moon, and the overpowered Sailor Team must one again rely on the mysterious new Sailor Senshi.

episodes.name: A Handsome Boy? Haruka Tenoh’s Secret
episodes.overview: Usagi and Minako become besotted with Haruka Tenou, an attractive and sophisticated boy...or so they believe.

episodes.name: Usagi’s Idol! The Graceful Genius Michiru
episodes.overview: Concerned that she is not intelligent enough for the sophisticated Mamoru, Usagi seeks advice from Michiru.

episodes.name: Protect the Pure Heart! The Three-Way Battle
episodes.overview: Usagi's friend, Unazuki, is attacked by a Daimon and has her Pure Heart Crystal. After the crystal is dropped, Sailor Moon must race to find it and save Unazuki.

episodes.name: Let Moon Help with Your Love Problems
episodes.overview: Naru and Umino enter an Affection Contest in order to prove their love for each other, but find themselves targeted by a Daimon.

episodes.name: Coldhearted Uranus? Makoto in Danger
episodes.overview: Makoto is targeted by a Daimon, but manages to evade it. Haruka befriends Makoto in order to get close to her and her pure heart crystal.

episodes.name: The Labyrinth of Water! Ami Targeted
episodes.overview: Ami's desire to avoid competition leads to her offending Michiru during a swimming race. Meanwhile, a Daimon selects Ami as her target.

episodes.name: To Save Our Friends! Moon and Uranus Join Forces
episodes.overview: After Sailor Neptune is captured and possibly killed by Kaolinite, Sailor Moon and Sailor Uranus find themselves shackled together and are forced to reassess their attitudes toward each tower.

episodes.name: A Man’s Kindness! Yuichiro, Heartbroken by Rei?
episodes.overview: Worried by Rei's increasingly intensive meditation, Yuuichirou becomes concerned that she has fallen for another man. When he sees her with Haruka, he is convinced that she is Rei's new suitor.

episodes.name: I Want to Quit Being a Sailor Guardian! Minako’s Dilemma
episodes.overview: inako becomes despondent about her life as a Sailor Venus. Meanwhile, an old friend of hers is attacked by Daimon.

episodes.name: Usagi in Tears! A Glass Slipper for My Birthday
episodes.overview: Usagi is mad at Mamoru for not knowing its her birthday, but feels guilty because she realizes she never told him when it was. For her birthday, Mamo gets her glass slippers, but the Heart Daimon egg is inside.

episodes.name: The Stolen Pure Heart! Usagi’s Crisis
episodes.overview: Sailor Moon's heart crystal was almost stolen. Neptune and Uranus restore it, and the senshi know they are Michiru and Haruka. A battle with Kaori, causes her to fall down to her death and well, she dies.

episodes.name: The Arrival of a Small Pretty Guardian
episodes.overview: Chibiusa comes to town during a carnival, where all the senshi are working. A singer for the carnival in Eugeal's target, and she is attacked...and all the senshi, including Chibiusa as Chibi Moon, fight to save her heart.

episodes.name: Making New Friends! Chibi Moon’s Adventure
episodes.overview: Lonely Chibiusa looks for friends, and when she finds one...it's a target, so they must help to save his heart.

episodes.name: I Want Power! Mako Lost in Doubt
episodes.overview: Makoto loses a fight, and decides to go to a training place with one of the smartest and most courageous trainers of all time, and the girls follow. The master happens to be a target, and they must save his heart as soon as they can, but Jupiter is especially on the job.

episodes.name: The Bond of Destiny! Uranus’s Distant Past
episodes.overview: Haruka thinks about old times, while Usagi and the inners explore their soon-to-be high school, where they meet Haruka's old racing friend, Elsa Gray...who is a target. Uranus and Neptune, along with the inners, fight to save her heart against the daimon, and her heart is not pure, so it is restored.

episodes.name: Art Is an Explosion of Love!Chibi-Usa’s First Love
episodes.overview: Chibiusa develops a crush on Masanori, the young sculptor in her art class. However, Masanori seems more interested in Michiru.

episodes.name: Usagi Dancing to the Waltz
episodes.overview: Usagi and her friends are invited to a party for foreign university students, but her enthusiasm is tempered by the knowledge that most of the conversation will be in English.

episodes.name: The Shocking Moment! Everyone’s Identities Revealed
episodes.overview: Minako realizes that she is the only one of the Sailor Team not to have been targeted for her Pure Heart Crystal, and takes increasingly absurd measures to prove her purity.

episodes.name: The Death of Uranus and Neptune: The Talismans Appear
episodes.overview: The time has come! Eugeal wants a fight with Neptune and Uranus, and they will sacrifice even each other to get the talismans. But then they learn that they, and Pluto, hold the talismans. Neptune's Mirror, Uranus' Sword and Pluto's Garnet Orb.

episodes.name: The Holy Grail’s Mystical Power! Moon’s Double Transformation
episodes.overview: Sailor Pluto appears and reawakens Sailor Uranus and Sailor Neptune, and the three talismans resonate with each other (The third being Pluto's Garnet Orb). The Holy Grail appears, and Sailor Moon drives Eudial out. Mimete kills Eudial by sabotaging her car.

episodes.name: Who Is the True Messiah? Chaos of Light and Darkness
episodes.overview: Chibi-Usa meets up with Hotaru Tomoe, who has quite a darkside.

episodes.name: A House Filled with Evil Presence: The Beautiful Hotaru’s Secret
episodes.overview: Usagi discovers that Kaori is alive and posing as Tomoe maid. Does Hotaru have anything to do with the messiah?

episodes.name: I Love Idols! Mimete’s Dilemma
episodes.overview: Mimet is a fan of idols. Will this affect her abilities as a Death Buster?

episodes.name: Shadow of Silence?! The Pale Glimmer of a Firefly
episodes.overview: Hotaru over-exerts herself and is taken to hospital, while Mimete targets a television actor for his Pure Heart Crystal.

episodes.name: Sunny Skies After a Storm! A Friendship Dedicated to Hotaru
episodes.overview: Chibiusa invites Hotaru on a picnic at a local botanical garden, not realizing that the resident botanist is the next target of the Death Busters.

episodes.name: Higher and Stronger! A Cheer from Usagi
episodes.overview: Everyone begins to learn more about the outer soliders through Mamoru's story.

episodes.name: The Battle Inside the Demonic Space: The Sailor Guardians' Gamble
episodes.overview: When Mimete decides to help in the production of a Daimon, she accidentally creates an anomaly that fractures the dimensions inside the Tomoe residence, trapping Chibiusa and Hotaru.

episodes.name: The Messiah of Silence Awakens! Stars of Destiny
episodes.overview: Chibiusa invites Hotaru to a show at the planetarium, while Mimete plans to steal the Pure Heart Crystal of the DJ Thomas Harris.

episodes.name: An Invasion from Another Dimension! Mystery of Mugen Academy
episodes.overview: After Hotaru and her father disappear from their house, the Sailor Senshi infiltrate Mugen Academy, suspicious that it is connected to the Death Busters.

episodes.name: A Bewitching Flower That Steals Hearts! Tellu, the Third Witch
episodes.overview: Tellu opens a store selling Telluns, plants designed to remove Pure Heart Crystals. Meanwhile, Hotaru wakes up, confused, in the Messiah of Silence's chamber.

episodes.name: Believe in Love: Ami, the Kindhearted Guardian
episodes.overview: With the latest round of national Patrice exams being held at Mugen Academy, the Sailor Team infiltrate the school and Ami encounters her academic rival, Yui Bidou.

episodes.name: Shadow of Destruction: The Messiah of Silence Awakens
episodes.overview: Cyprine, the last of the Witches 5, summons Mugen Academy's students in order to remove their Pure Heart Crystal, while Kaolinite targets Chibiusa.

episodes.name: The Coming Terror of Darkness! Struggle of the Eight Guardians
episodes.overview: The Sailor Senshi approach Mugen Academy in order to save Chibiusa and defeat the Death Busters, while Mistress 9 plans to steal the Holy Grail from Sailor Moon.

episodes.name: The Shining Shooting Star! Saturn and the Messiah
episodes.overview: Mistress 9 steals the Holy Grail, allowing Pharaoh 90 to pass through the portal to Earth. The fate of the world rests in the hands of the Senshi of Ruin, Sailor Saturn.

episodes.name: A New Life! Parting of the Stars of Destiny
episodes.overview: The Death Busters have been defeated, but Hotaru is reduced to infancy and Sailor Pluto's whereabouts are still unknown. Meanwhile, Haruka and Michiru have one last mission before they leave Azabu-Juban.

episodes.name: A Guardian’s Realization: Strength Lies Within a Pure Heart
episodes.overview: A final Daimon emerges from the rubble of Mugen Academy and begins to steal pure hearts. Chibiusa leaves for the future, and comes back just in time to help destroy the Daimon.

3.name: Sailor Moon S
3.overview: Isagi's friend Rei has been plagued by disturbing visions of the Apocalypse just as a new enemy appears in the city. The Maniacal Professor Tomoe, leader of the Death Busters, has been targeting innocent citizens in search for three special pure heart crystals. Usagi is prepared to confront this dangerous new foe, but two powerful new Sailor Guardians are already seeking the crystals and have no interest in working with Sailor Moon and the other Guardians. Where did they come from, and what is their plan for pure heart crystals?

episodes.name: Meeting of Destiny! The Night Pegasus Dances
episodes.overview: During a solar eclipse, a mysterious floating circus tent appears in the sky over Tokyo. Meanwhile, Chibiusa is fascinated by a Pegasus who appears to her in a dream.

episodes.name: Super Transformation! Once Again Pegasus’s Power
episodes.overview: When Reika returns from Africa, Usagi becomes concerned that she and Motoki are having relationship problems. Meanwhile, Tiger's Eye selects Reika as a target.

episodes.name: Protect Mom’s Dream! Double Moon’s New Attack
episodes.overview: When Ikuko is attacked by Hawk's Eye, Sailor Moon must once again rely on the mysterious Pegasus for assistance.

episodes.name: Catch Pegasus! The Amazon’s Trap
episodes.overview: When Hawk's Eye announces he has designed a system to trap Pegasus, Tiger's Eye approaches Naru with the intention of using her as bait.

episodes.name: The Perfect Couple! Usagi and Mamoru’s Love
episodes.overview: Chibiusa worries that Saori, a friend of Mamoru's from college, is romantically interested in him.

episodes.name: Artemis is Cheating?! Enter the Mysterious Kitten
episodes.overview: Rumors of Artemis' interest in other women spiral out of control after a small talking kitten appears, claiming that Artemis is her father.

episodes.name: Makoto’s Friendship! The Girl Who Admired Pegasus
episodes.overview: Usagi and Chibiusa are excited to discover that a best-selling book was written by an old friend of Makoto's.

episodes.name: Connecting Hearts! Chibi-Usa and Pegasus
episodes.overview: Tiger's Eye targets Chibiusa's art teacher in the hopes of attacking Pegasus and finding his host.

episodes.name: Protect Mamoru! Ninja Usagi’s Jealousy
episodes.overview: Mamoru moves into the Hikawa Shrine after his apartment is wrecked, so Usagi assumes the guise of a ninja to protect his honor.

episodes.name: Forest of Illusion! A Beautiful Fairy’s Invitation
episodes.overview: Chibi-Usa befriends a young man, an artist fixated on the existence of fairies, who is targeted by Fish-eye.

episodes.name: Drive to the Heavens! The Dream Car Fueled with Love
episodes.overview: Ami befriends Mamoru's colleague Natsumi, a widow who is trying to restore a classic car.

episodes.name: Aiming for the Top! The Pretty Swordswoman’s Dilemma
episodes.overview: A young girl with dreams of being the strongest swordsman in Japan is targeted by Tiger's Eye.

episodes.name: We Love Fashion! The Stylish Guardians
episodes.overview: Fisheye targets the fashion designer Yoshiki Usui, while Usagi hopes to persuade the designer to make her a wedding dress for free.

episodes.name: Storm of Lov!e Minako’s Grand Two-Timing Plan
episodes.overview: Usagi and the girls are shocked to find out that Minako is dating two boys at the same time, but little does anymore realize that her suitors are Tiger's Eye and Hawk's Eye.

episodes.name: The Secret Mansion! A Menu of Love for You
episodes.overview: The girls become interested in an apparently antisocial old woman after she takes Diana into her home.

episodes.name: Believe in Pegasus! The Four Guardians’ Super Transformation
episodes.overview: Reports begin to flood in of a Pegasus wreaking havoc in the city. Meanwhile, a popular boy shows an interest in Chibiusa.

episodes.name: Shining Summer Days! Ami Under the Sea-Breeze
episodes.overview: Shingo develops a crush on Ami during a trip to the beach, while Tiger's Eye plot to seduce her.

episodes.name: Become a Prima! Usagi’s Ballet
episodes.overview: Usagi begins ballet lesson in the hope of becoming a prima. Fisheye enrolls in the same class, and soon catches the eye of the instructor.

episodes.name: Juban Holiday! The Carefree Princess
episodes.overview: Usagi and Chibiusa are befriended by a mysterious foreign woman who accompanies them to the Azabu-Juuban summer festival. Unbeknownst to them, their acquaintance is a visiting princess who is being pursed by both her government and Hawk's Eye.

episodes.name: Destined Partners! Makoto’s Innocence
episodes.overview: Tiger's Eye plans to seduce the girls at a university dance party, while Makoto is immediately smitten with the charming stranger.

episodes.name: Shadow of Evil! The Trio’s Last Chance
episodes.overview: While Fisheye targets Mamoru, Queen Nehellenia appears before the Amazon Trio and warns them that without the Golden Crystal, they will soon revert to their animal forms.

episodes.name: Mirrors of Dreams! the Amazon’s Last Stage
episodes.overview: Fisheye discovers Chibiusa communicating with Pegasus, but refuses to cooperate with Zirconia's plans. As Hawk's Eye pursues Usagi for her Dream Mirror, Zirconia decides that the Amazon Trio have outlived their usefulness.

episodes.name: The Amazoness! Nightmare From Behind the Mirrors
episodes.overview: Zirconia sends the Amazoness Quartet in search of the Golden Mirror, and their first target is Chibiusa's friend Momoko.

episodes.name: True Power Explodes! Ami’s Melody of the Heart
episodes.overview: Ami becomes obsessed with a tune she found on the internet, and writes lyrics to it. Meanwhile, VesVes of the Amazoness Quartet targets the tune's composer.

episodes.name: Flames of Passion! Mars’s Raging Super Attack
episodes.overview: Rei becomes a celebrity after being featured in a magazine article, and gains a dedicated young fan called Nanako.

episodes.name: Dentist of Horrors? Palla-Palla’s House
episodes.overview: When Usagi and ChibiUsa need to go to dentist, they try a new office which has opened in the neighborhood, but is it a trap?

episodes.name: Clash of Dreams! Minako and Makoto’s Broken Friendship
episodes.overview: Makoto and Minako both fall for an attractive kindergarten teacher, but Minako's all-out attempts to ingratiate herself with him soon annoyed to Makoto.

episodes.name: Overcome Your Fear! the Jump to Freedom
episodes.overview: On the eve of his school's athletic meet, Kyuusuke worries about the box horse, the one obstacle he is unable to clear. JunJun approaches him with the intention of taking his Dream Mirror, and offers to be his coach.

episodes.name: Don’t Lose Sight of Your Dreams! The Mirror of Truth
episodes.overview: Usagi and Chibiusa befriend Kamoi, a starving young artist, who is later targeted by CereCere.

episodes.name: Pegasus Disappears! Wavering Friendship
episodes.overview: While VesVes targets an eccentric acquaintance of Chibiusa's who is trying to make a flying machine, Chibiusa worries that Pegasus does not trust her.

episodes.name: Pegasus’s Secret: The Boy Who Protects the Dream World
episodes.overview: PallaPalla's magic causes Usagi and Chibiusa to switch ages, turning Usagi into a child and Chibiusa into a teenager. While Chibiusa is thrilled with her new body, she is distressed to discover that she can no longer call Pegasus.

episodes.name: Chibi-Usa’s Little Rhapsody of Love
episodes.overview: As Chibiusa becomes even more enamoured of Helios, Usagi and her friends realise that she is in love, and are determined to discover the identity of her crush.

episodes.name: Dream to be an Adult! The Amazoness’ Confusion
episodes.overview: Usagi and her friends, along with the Amazoness Quartet, assist in the organization of a coming-of-age ceremony.

episodes.name: Terror in Motion! The Dark Queen’s Evil Hand
episodes.overview: Intent on escaping her mirror, Queen Nehellenia causes spider webs to appear all over the city, casting it into darkness.

episodes.name: The Source of Darkness: Dead Moon Circus
episodes.overview: The Sailor Team infiltrate the Dead Moon Circus and are confronted by Zirconia.

episodes.name: Labyrinth of Mirrors! Chibi Moon Captured
episodes.overview: After being captured by Queen Nehellenia, Sailor Chibi Moon confronts the evil queen.

episodes.name: The Golden Crystal Appears: Nehellenia's Magic
episodes.overview: Queen Nehellenia forces Helios to return to his body and give up the Golden Crystal, allowing the evil queen to break free from her mirror.

episodes.name: When the Crystal Shines! The Beautiful Power of Dreams
episodes.overview: Queen Nehellenia, free from her mirror at last, prepares to use the power of the Golden Crystal.

episodes.name: Dreams Forever! Fill the Heavens with Light
episodes.overview: Queen Nehellenia makes a desperate last stand as the Golden Crystal destroys the Dead Moon Circus.

4.name: Sailor Moon SuperS
4.overview: A majestic pegasus with a golden horn has appeared in Chibi-Usa's dreams with a request - to help him and keep his presence a secret. This plea turns out to be more than a childish dream, for soon the fearsome Dead Moon Circus arrives in town! Led by the villainous Zirconia and the beautiful Queen Nehalennia, their goal is to draw out Pegasus by targeting people with beautiful dreams! Sailor Moon and the Sailor Guardians must unite to fight powerful new enemies, but these enemies are hiding secrets of their own...

episodes.name: The Flower of Nightmares Scatters! The Queen of Darkness Returns
episodes.overview: As Usagi and her friends begin high school, a mysterious force releases Queen Nehellenia from her mirror, encouraging her to take revenge on them.

episodes.name: Saturn Awakens! The Ten Sailor Guardians Unite
episodes.overview: While Queen Nehellenia continues to exert her evil influence on the earth, the rapidly aging Hotaru re-awakens as Sailor Saturn.

episodes.name: The Cursed Mirror! Mamoru Caught in a Nightmare
episodes.overview: People all around Tokyo, including Mamoru, become entranced by mirrors. Usagi remembers a shadow she saw in Mamoru's mirror, and races off with the other soldiers to find him.

episodes.name: Night of Destiny! The Sailor Guardians’ Ordeals
episodes.overview: Sailor Moon is left devastated after seeing Mamoru get abducted right before her very eyes. To make matters worse, Nehelenia's action is starting to cause a time paradox, which threatens to end Chibiusa's existence.

episodes.name: For Love! The Endless Battle in the Dark World
episodes.overview: Sailor Moon runs off to save Mamoru from Nehelina alone. The rest of the Sailor Guardians try to go after her, but one by one they fall victim to Nehelina's traps.

episodes.name: Moon Power of Love! The Nightmare Ends
episodes.overview: Sailor Chibi Moon and Sailor Saturn make it to Nehelinia's palace, where Mamoru is being held prisoner. But despite their best efforts, the two Guardians are unable to free him, and Sailor Chibi Moon fades from existence.

episodes.name: Farewells and Encounters! The Transitioning Stars of Destiny
episodes.overview: Mamoru tells Usagi that he's accepted an offer to study abroad in the U.S., which will force them to have a long-distance relationship. Saddened at first, Usagi eventually decides to root for her boyfriend's dream and sends him off with a smile.

episodes.name: A School Storm! The Transfer Students Are Idols
episodes.overview: Usagi runs into Seiya again and is annoyed by his cocky attitude. The next day, she is surprised to find that Seiya and the rest of the Three Lights have transferred to her school.

episodes.name: Becoming an Idol! Minako’s Ambition
episodes.overview: Minako decides to work for the Three Lights as their personal assistant thinking it will help her quickly get into the entertainment industry. But Minkao soon realizes that being a star isn't all fun and glamor.

episodes.name: Fighter’s Secret Identity! The Shocking Super Transformation
episodes.overview: The Three Lights are rehearsing for their upcoming musical, which they will be starring in. But they seem to have a hard time winning the approval of the stage director, especially Seiya, who feels that he is being personally tested.

episodes.name: A Star of Dreams and Wishes! Taiki’s Transformation
episodes.overview: Ami invited Taiki to come and watch the Wataru's Comet pass by Earth with their science teacher, Amanogawa, only to be rejected.

episodes.name: Luna’s Discovery! The Real Face of Yaten
episodes.overview: Yaten temporarily adopts Luna.

episodes.name: Friend or Foe? Star Lights and the Sailor Guardians
episodes.overview: Taiki asks Makoto to appear on a cooking show with him. Usagi decides to tag along, but her clumsiness creates a huge mess at the TV studio.

episodes.name: Calling of the Shining Stars! Enter Haruka and Michiru
episodes.overview: Usagi and the girls try to buy tockets to a Three Lights concert, only to learn it is already sold out. Michiru then passes by and gives them the tickets, revealing that she will be performing with the Three Lights.

episodes.name: Seiya and Usagi’s Heart-Pounding Date
episodes.overview: Seiya asks Usagi on a date, to which she reluctantly agrees. Sailor Iron Mouse attempts to make up for her recent failures by going after Seiya's star seed.

episodes.name: Invaders from Outer Space! The Coming of Siren
episodes.overview: Usagi and Lina encounters a little girl who appears to be lost. The two later return home that day and are surprised to find the same girl now living in Usagi's house as her younger sister.

episodes.name: The Screaming Dead Terror of the Camp Monster
episodes.overview: Over the summer, the girls go camping in the mountains, where they run into the Three Lights, who are there shooting for an upcoming film.

episodes.name: A Night Alone Together! Usagi In Danger
episodes.overview: When Usagi is home alone, she invites Seiya over. The other Senshi and some surprise visitors show up as well!

episodes.name: Taiki’s Song Filled With Passion and Faith
episodes.overview: Taiki begins to question if their activity as the Three Lights is really helping with their goal of finding their missing princess. His frustration continues to grow, to the point where he no longer feels like singing.

episodes.name: Chibi-chibi’s Mystery! the Big Noisy Chase
episodes.overview: Lately, Chibi-Chibi has been coming home with a lot of snacks. Curious to know where she's been getting all the snacks from, Usagi and the girls decide to follow Chibi-Chibi around for the day.

episodes.name: The Shining Power of a Star! Chibi-chibi’s Transformation
episodes.overview: Usagi finds herself teamed up with Seiya for the annual school softball tournament. To make matters worse, Isagi becomes a target of Seiya's fans, who think she is hitting on him.

episodes.name: Invitation to Terror! Usagi’s Night Flight
episodes.overview: Sailor Aluminum Siren learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Using this knowledge, she sets a trap on a plane where the Three Lights are holding an in-flight event in order to get Usagi's attention.

episodes.name: Duty or Friendship? Conflict Between the Sailor Guardians
episodes.overview: The Inner Senshi and the Starlights learn each others real identities, but distrust each other, Usagi and Seiya try to bring both groups together.

episodes.name: Truth Revealed! the Star Lights’ Past
episodes.overview: Seiya and Usagi try to stay together after the Outer Senshi and the other two Starlights forbid them from seeing each other.

episodes.name: Butterflies of Light! a New Chapter on the Horizon
episodes.overview: Ami and the others try to clear up the misunderstanding the Three Lights have about Usagi but are unable to get in touch with them. As a last resort, the girls decide to enter a video game tournament where the winner gets a chance to speak with Taiki.

episodes.name: Go for Your Dream! Minako Becomes an Idol
episodes.overview: Minako is close to realizing her lifelong dream of become an idol after making it to the final round of auditions in a talent-search contest. But Minako is now thinking of turning down the offer, as she cannot ignore her duty as a Sailor Guardian.

episodes.name: The Stolen Silver Crystal! Princess Kakyu Appears
episodes.overview: Usagi and her classmates are all busy preparing for the upcoming Juban School Festival. Meanwhile, Sailor Lead Crow finds a note left behind by her deceased friend Sailor Aluminum Siren that contains information on Sailor Moon's true identity.

episodes.name: Crusade for the Galaxy! Legend of The Sailor Wars
episodes.overview: Princess Kakyu, the missing princess whom the Star Lights have long been searching for, finally appears before the Sailor Guardians. Princess Kakyu explains that she has come to Earth in search of the Light of Hope.

episodes.name: Princess Kakyu Perishes! Advent of Galaxia
episodes.overview: Usagi finally confesses to Rei that she has been unable to get in touch with Mamoru for the past several months. Meanwhile, the Three Lights publicly announce their intention to disband their group.

episodes.name: Countdown to Destruction! the Sailor Guardians’ Last Battle
episodes.overview: Princess Kakyu perishes after being defeated by Galaxia. Devastated, the Sailor Star Lights go after Galaxia to avenge their fallen princess. Meanwhile, Sailor Moon and the rest of the Guardians also prepare for their battle to protect the galaxy.

episodes.name: Ruler of the Galaxy! The Menace of Galaxia
episodes.overview: Sailor Mars, Mercury, Jupiter, and Venus lose their star seeds after shielding Sailor Moon and the Star Lights from Galaxia's attack. The four Outer Guardians entrust Sailor Moon to the Star Lights while they try to stop Galaxia.

episodes.name: Dying Stars! Uranus and Neptune’s Last Stand
episodes.overview: Uranus and Neptune have turned against the Sailor Guardians by swearing allegiance to Galaxia. Despite Sailor Moon's desperate plea, the two continue their attack, forcing Sailor Moon and the Star Lights to retreat.

episodes.name: The Light of Hope! The Final Battle for the Galaxy
episodes.overview: Galaxia is revealed to be the Legendary Sailor Guardian who sealed away Chaos long ago. However, she has since become corrupt and has gone to conquer the galaxy herself.

episodes.name: Usagi’s Love! The Moonlight Illuminates the Galaxy
episodes.overview: As Galaxia closes in to take Sailor Moon's star seed, the Light of Hope finally reveals itself. Turning into a sword, the Light of Hope begs Usagi to use its power to stop Galaxia, who is now fully consumed by Chaos.

5.name: Sailor Moon Sailor Stars
5.overview:
The five Sailor Guardians – Usagi, Ami, Rei, Makoto, and Minako enter high school, while Mamoru heads to America for college. Their new lives, filled with dreams and hopes, begin. However, this peace won't last long as a new, powerful, and evil enemy is approaching Earth: Sailor Galaxia, who has been gathering star seeds throughout the galaxy and scheming to rule the universe with limitless power.

Sensing that Sailor Moon is in danger, the four Guardians of the Outer Planets – Sailor Uranus, Sailor Neptune, Sailor Pluto, and Sailor Saturn- also make their entry, and the ten Sailor Guardians are together again! On top of this, a group of mysterious Sailor Guardians known as the Sailor Star Lights also appear.
